short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid distractions whilst on LinkedIn by removing the news feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yes, it's great to stay connected and be open to new business opportunities...But not when you're in a beautiful flow of work and don't want to be distracted.

This small, simple extensions solves that exact problem. Block your LinkedIn news feed and crack on with only the tasks that will make you most productive.

Enjoy and don't forget to share, comment of give feedback!

All the best,

Jason
